definition: in the fourth place, coming next after the third and just before the fifth in position or time or degree or magnitude, the musical interval between one note and another four notes away from it
details:
adverb
- in the fourth place
= example: in the fourth place
= synonyms: fourthly
adjective
- coming next after the third and just before the fifth in position or time or degree or magnitude
= synonyms: quaternary
noun
- the musical interval between one note and another four notes away from it
- one of four equal parts
= synonyms: quarter
- following the third position
